title: Adapting Instruction for Students with Disabilities in General Education Programs
description: For Level I Special Education Credential candidates. Curriculum and method in teaching science, social science, mathematics, reading and the arts at the elementary schools including scope and sequence and appropriate methods for English language learners. The learning environment in the middle, junior high school, and secondary school with emphasis on specific single subject teaching area. 3 seminars, 1 activity.
prerequisites: Acceptance into Level I Special Education Credential Program, EDUC 440
